programme.title: Benaam Badsha
programme.desc: An abandoned man grows up to be a paid assassin who assaults Jyoti on her wedding day, ruining her life forever. However, she soon moves in with him and decides to reform him.

programme.title: Surkhiyaan - The Headlines
programme.desc: There is an ongoing turmoil between a group of people who wants to keep their newspaper running at any cost, purely for the sake of making money. There is a dearth of sensational news that the employees have to overcome to increase the demand for their newspaper.

programme.title: Sherni
programme.desc: After seing her family get murdered and the local police refusing to get involved with the fear of crossing the wrong man a young woman named Durga picks up the gun and chooses a criminal lifestyle to avenge the death of her family.

programme.title: Ekkees Tareekh Shubh Muhurat
programme.desc: A 55-year-old aspiring storyteller wanting to escape his family legacy of becoming a priest. His dream comes true in an unexpected way, when he is jailed and he finds an audience amongst the prisoners.

programme.title: Abhimaan
programme.desc: Subir, a popular singer in show business, encourages his wife and a talented singer, Uma to take up singing as a career. However, his pride is wounded and their marital bliss is threatened when Uma's popularity surpasses his own.

programme.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
programme.desc: A family of five is separated in an unfortunate incident. The three brothers are raised in different religious households. As fate would have it, the family reunites after several years and avenges those responsible for their separation.

programme.title: Jab We Met
programme.desc: The life of a suicidal industrialist takes a sharp turn when he meets a spirited chatterbox on a train journey in this breezy Bollywood romantic comedy.
